de.btu.openinfra.backend

Class Reflection

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.btu.openinfra.backend.Reflection

  • public class Reflection
extends Object
    This class supplies methods to request classes for a given package name or a reflections object ( Reflections).
    Author:
    BTU DBIS

      static <Type> List<Class<? extends Type>> findAllClasses(org.reflections.Reflections reflections)
      This method finds all classes for the given reflections object.
      static <Type> List<Class<? extends Type>> findAllClasses(String packageName)
      This method finds all classes for the given package name (the result also includes classes of the sub packages).

        public static <Type> List<Class<? extends Type>> findAllClasses(String packageName)

        Returns:
        list of all classes for the given package name
